drug.name: WL-1002
drug.description: WL-1002 is developed by Winston Laboratories which is a topical cream formulation of 075% zucapaicin (also known as civamide), for the treatment of pain due to osteoarthritis.

article.citation: Hua XY, Chen P, Hwang J, Yaksh TL: Antinociception induced by civamide, an orally active capsaicin analogue. Pain. 1997 Jul;71(3):313-22.

drug.indication: Investigated for use/treatment in osteoarthritis and pain (acute or chronic).
drug.mechanism-of-action: An active ingredients in WL-1002 is civamide which has anticeptic property.The antinociception of civamide is probably mediated two mechanisms: (i) an acute receptor occupancy dependent effect; and (ii) a persistent and receptor independent effect which is initiated by the acute exposure to the drug.
